abstract.text: Prepares a set of glyphs for processing by character-based routines.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: This function takes a buffer of glyphs, specified in the
parameter, and packs them into a condensed character array. The character array is returned in the
parameter, which should have enough space for at least ((4 * count) + 1) bytes to guarantee that the packed glyphs fit.
specifies the number of glyphs in
specifies how the glyphs are currently packed.
